      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COUCH_DEFAULT_FS_ROOT
      defines where 1xio/rxf finds static content root.
      static String COUCH_DEFAULT_ORGNAME
      creates the orgname used in factories without localized namespaces
      static Map<one.xio.HttpMethod,Map<Pattern,Class<? extends one.xio.AsioVisitor.Impl>>> NAMESPACE
      a map of http methods each containing an ordered map of regexes tested in order of map insertion.
      static String RXF_ORGNAME_ENV_KEY
      a key to specify tenant name among otherwise identical apps on a common couch server

      overrides RXF_ORGNAME_SYSTEM_KEY
      static String RXF_ORGNAME_SYSTEM_KEY
      a key for java -D xxxx to specify a tenant name
      static String RXF_SERVER_CONTENT_ROOT_ENV_KEY
      content root env key
      static String RXF_SERVER_CONTENT_ROOT_SYSTEM_KEY
      specify web/gwt content root a key for java -Drxf.server.content.root=target/my[roject-1.0 (if maven)
